text.section: Every company licensed under this chapter shall provide to the commissioner a list of its officers and directors, their names, addresses, principal business activities, and occupations or employment.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 881, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 315, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
